successes.title: Deadzone: The Sci-fi Miniatures Board Game
successes.description: Deadzone is the sci-fi tabletop miniatures skirmish game played in a fully interactive 3D gaming environment.

Pledges.description: Civilian - a digital copy of the Deadzone rules!

Scout - One Faction Starter of your choice - choose from Enforcers, Rebs, Plague and Marauders! You will also get a Faction Card Deck and a Digital Rulebook. Includes UK and US shipping. Please see main page for international shipping rates.

Scientist – The Board Game Edition of Deadzone featuring 18 Pre-Assembled Deadzone Figures, clip together scenery, mini-rulebook and everything you need to play the game PLUS a Digital Copy of the Rules. Includes UK and US Shipping. Please see main page for international shipping rates.

EARLY BIRD! Recon - One Enforcer Faction Starter, one Plague Faction Starter, two Faction Card Decks, plastic Scenery sprues, Deadzone Rulebook, gaming mat, counters and dice PLUS Digital Rules, Exclusive Signed Art Print, Deadzone Art Cards, your name listed on the Deadzone Website AND any Stretch Goals applicable. Includes UK and US Shipping. Please see main page for international shipping rates.

EARLY BIRD! One-click Urban Battlefield – scenery only pledge! Choose any *4* BattleZones of your choice from the list of unlocked themes – please see main page for details - PLUS *2* Accessory Sprues! Sprue designs subject to change. Includes UK and US Shipping. Please see main page for international shipping rates.

Choose any *12* BattleZones of your choice from the list of unlocked themes - please see main page for details - PLUS *6* Accessory Sprues! Sprue designs subject to change. Includes UK and US Shipping. Please see main page for international shipping rates.

One-click Urban Wargames Table! – scenery only pledge! Choose any *12* BattleZones of your choice from the list of unlocked themes - please see main page for details - PLUS *6* Accessory Sprues! Sprue designs subject to change. Includes UK and US Shipping. Please see main page for international shipping rates.

Assault Team - 2 x Strike Team! Two of everything from the Strike Team Pledge Level, including Stretch Goal Rewards. Includes UK and US Shipping. Please see main page for international shipping rates.

Suppression Team - 3 x Strike Team! Three of everything from the Strike Team Pledge Level, including Stretch Goal Rewards. Includes UK and US Shipping. Please see main page for international shipping rates.

Captain - Your own custom Enforcer figure designed to your specification! PLUS the contents of Strike Team: One Enforcer Faction Starter, one Plague Faction Starter, one Rebs Factions Starter, one Marauder Faction Starter, four Faction Card Decks, plastic Scenery sprues, Deadzone Rulebook, gaming mat, counters and dice PLUS Digital Rules, Exclusive Signed Art Print, Deadzone Art Cards, your name listed on the Deadzone Website AND any Stretch Goals applicable. Includes UK and US Courier Shipping. Please see main page for international shipping rates.

Deadzone Retailer Bundle – A fantastic launch pack for your store which contains a combination of game sets, faction starters and individual blisters at an incredible trade discount, up to a value of $500 + marketing materials. You will also be listed as a gaming venue on the Deadzone website. Note – this reward is only available to traders. For full details, including shipping rates, please private message us.

Fleet Command - Your own Deadzone Gameboard with assembled and painted Deadzone Scenery! PLUS the contents of Strike Team: One Enforcer Faction Starter, one Plague Faction Starter, one Rebs Factions Starter, one Marauder Faction Starter, four Faction Card Decks, plastic Scenery sprues, Deadzone Rulebook, gaming mat, counters and dice PLUS Digital Rules, Exclusive Signed Art Print, Deadzone Art Cards, your name listed on the Deadzone Website AND any Stretch Goals applicable. Includes UK and US Courier Shipping. Please see main page for international shipping rates.

Central Command - Get any two of your Deadzone Faction Starters painted by the Mantic Studio and a Deadzone Gameboard with assembled and painted Deadzone Scenery! PLUS the contents of Strike Team: One Enforcer Faction Starter, one Plague Faction Starter, one Rebs Factions Starter, one Marauder Faction Starter, four Faction Card Decks, plastic Scenery sprues, Deadzone Rulebook, gaming mat, counters and dice PLUS Digital Rules, Exclusive Signed Art Print, Deadzone Art Cards, your name listed on the Deadzone Website AND any Stretch Goals applicable. Includes UK and US Courier Shipping. Please see main page for international shipping rates.

Mercenary - Design your own Deadzone Mercenary and get a rare painted resin master of your figure. In addition, get any two of your Deadzone Faction Starters to be painted by the Mantic Studio and a Deadzone Gameboard with assembled and painted Deadzone Scenery! PLUS the contents of Strike Team: One Enforcer Faction Starter, one Plague Faction Starter, one Rebs Factions Starter, one Marauder Faction Starter, four Faction Card Decks, plastic Scenery sprues, Deadzone Rulebook, gaming mat, counters and dice, your name listed on the Deadzone Website PLUS Digital Rules, Exclusive Signed Art Print, Deadzone Art Cards AND any Stretch Goals applicable. Includes UK and US Shipping. Please see main page for international shipping rates.

Council of Seven - Become a real part of Deadzone history! You'll get to design your own Deadzone Mercenary and get it written into the background of the game. You'll get a unique concept art print of your design and get a rare painted resin master of the finished model. You'll also get a phone call with Games Designer Jake Thornton over Skype. In addition, you'll get *four* Deadzone Faction Starters painted by the Mantic Studio and a Deadzone Gameboard with assembled and painted Deadzone Scenery! PLUS the contents of Strike Team: One Enforcer Faction Starter, one Plague Faction Starter, one Rebs Factions Starter, one Marauder Faction Starter, four Faction Card Decks, plastic Scenery sprues, Deadzone Rulebook, gaming mat, counters and dice PLUS Digital Rules, Exclusive Signed Art Print, Deadzone Art Cards, your name listed on the Deadzone Website AND any Stretch Goals applicable. Includes UK and US Shipping. Please see main page for international shipping rates.
